titles.title: A resolution celebrating the centennial of Union Station in Washington, District of Columbia.
A resolution celebrating the centennial of Union Station in Washington, District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Celebrates the centennial of Union Station in Washington, DC.
Encourages people of the United States to continue to visit and learn about Union Station and its storied history.
